meaningMnemonic: This <radical>tree</radical> is very <radical>odd</radical>, to say the least. The shape is all crazy, like a lightning bolt stuck into the ground, or something. Oh wait, look at this. I can sit on it really nicely. It's just like a <kanji>chair</kanji>!
readingMnemonic: But, this odd tree <kanji>chair</kanji> is also home to an <reading>ea</reading>gle (い). It swoops down upon you as you sit down, gouging your eyes out.
